2022-04-29

Photo Friday: King Edward's Bay (a.k.a. Short Sands)

Panorama of King Edward’s Bay taken at low tide in early April.

Picture of the bay taken from Sharpness Point.

Postcard of the bay from pretty close to the same place as the one above.
(nabbed from the splendid TuckDB collection of postcards)

A clip from the OS Map surveyed in 1857 showing King Edward’s Bay as Short Sands and the Oxfauld gully.
(nabbed from the collection of The National Library of Scotland)
